moosecounter 0.4-0

Count Models

zeroinfl2.Rd

Count Models

zeroinfl2(
  formula,
  data,
  subset,
  na.action,
  weights,
  offset,
  dist = c("ZIP", "ZINB", "P", "NB"),
  link = c("logit", "probit", "cloglog"),
  control = NULL,
  model = TRUE,
  y = TRUE,
  x = FALSE,
  solveH = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

formula

model formula as in `pscl::zeroinfl()`
data

Moose data set
subset, na.action, weights, offset, model, y, x

arguments as in `pscl::zeroinfl()`
dist

count distribution, one of `"ZIP"`, `"ZINB"`, `"P"`, `"NB"`
link

link function for the zero model
control

see `pscl::zeroinfl.control()`
solveH

logical, to use robust matrix inversion to get VCV
...

control arguments
